body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Summon Nobel Hierarch 
2. Play a spell which requires {G} or {W} or {U} What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Noble Hierarch is not highlighted green and does not count towards the mana cost of any spell/ability. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.17b on Mac
author: [liang.le...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102368348789681036710/)
title: Noble Hierarch card does not have "{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool."
